price: O que há nos céus e o que há na terra glorificam a Allah. E Ele é O Todo-Poderoso, O Sábio.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
